channel.title: Dose anyone know if you can change stats? Please help
channel.description:
Ok here is my Q. and hopfully I get an A. How can you change the stats of the items in Silablsofts clients? I was wondering this because i would like them to have the same stats as is Runescape but i don't know how. With hers (the skill capes) i got emots and level requirements but i can't get the stats for the rune defender and other items. (Dragon full helm, rune defender, third age/range, fighter torso...)
Thanks for any help that i get. P.S. any real stats that you have would be great!

item.title: Dose anyone know if you can change stats? Please help
item.dc:creator: @glabay glabay
item.description:
@glabay wrote:

ooo ok thanks man i was wondering what the hell they were for like a week now lol i am a noob to coding i just started like a month ago ;D

Read full topic

item.title: Dose anyone know if you can change stats? Please help
item.dc:creator: @glabay glabay
item.description:
@glabay wrote:

go to config and look for item.cfg open it to notepad

//--------------------------------------------------------------------------||---------ATTACK BOUNES----------------||---------DEFENCE BOUNES----------------||--OTHER BOUNES-- //----- id ------ name ---------------- decription ---- idk --- idk --- idk -- stb --- slash --crush---mage---range-||-stab -- slash --crush--- mage---range-||-str --- magehit item = 14514 3rdage kite kite from the 3rd ahes 100 100 0 0 0 0 0 0 100 100 100 100 100 100 100 item = 14511 3rrd age legs its a 3rd age legs 100 100 0 0 0 0 0 0 100 100 100 100 100 100 100 item = 14512 3rd age plate plate from the 3rd age 100 100 0 0 0 0 0 0 100 100 100 100 100 100 100 item = 14508 3rd mage leg maic robes of 3rd age 100 110 0 -50 -60 -50 100 60 50 50 50 100 60 0 150 item = 14507 3rd mage top magic robe top of 3rd 100 100 0 -50 -60 -50 100 60 50 50 50 100 60 0 150 item = 14504 3rd range leg ranger legs of the 3rd 100 100 0 -50 -60 -50 60 100 50 50 50 60 100 0 0 item = 14503 3rd range top ranger top of the 3rd 100 100 0 -50 -60 -50 60 100 50 50 50 60 100 0 0 item = 14077 str cape (t) a true warrior wares it 100 100 0 50 100 100 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 150 0 item = 14080 def cape (t) a true man of steel 100 100 0 0 0 0 0 0 30 30 30 30 30 0 0 item = 14089 mage cape (t) a true wizzard/whitch 100 100 0 0 0 0 50 0 0 0 0 60 0 0 80 item = 14083 range cape (t) a tru man of the bow 100 100 0 0 0 0 0 60 0 0 0 0 50 0 0 item = 14086 prayer cape (t) a reguler man of lord 100 100 0 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 item = 14074 attack cape (t) a true man of the skill 100 100 0 60 30 30 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 20 0 item = 14235 hunter cape (t) a true hunter wares it 100 100 0 100 100 100 100 100 100 100 100 100 100 100 100 item = 15351 saradomin sword a godsword of sara 100 100 0 30 30 30 30 30 30 30 30 30 30 30 30

thast the stat bounes i got on some silabs items in my server good luck any questions just ask

Read full topic
